page.title: 13EVENTS
page.content:
THE NUMBER OF LOCAL ORGANISATIONS, CLUBS AND GROUPS ARE TOO NUMEROUS TO MENTION INDIVIDUALLY, BUT AN INDICATION IS FOUND ON THE BACK COVERS OF "LINK", A S.W.F. COMMUNITY MAGAZINE, SPONSORED BY THE LOCAL CHURCHES. IN THE LATEST EDITION, JUNE 1985, IT LISTED 82 SEPARATE GROUPS, RANGING FROM BRANCHES OF NATIONAL ORGANIZATIONS LIKE ROTARY AND THE ARMY CADET FORCE, TO NUMEROUS FOOTBALL CLUBS (JUNIOR & SENIOR), MAJORETTES, CAMERA CLUB, AND THE OVER FIFTIES CLUB.
IN S.W.F. A COMMUNITY CARE VOLUNTARY ORGANIZATION FLOURISHES.
